title: How to Install ARIES 6" Oval Side Bars on a Ram 1500
description: Learn just what you need and just what steps you'll take when installing a monster-sized set of ARIES 6" stainless steel side bars.
tags: Aries, Oval Nerf Bar, Side Bars, 6" Oval Nerf Bar, Dodge Ram 1500, install

asset.title: ARIES Side Bar Install: 6" SS Ovals 4500, S2885 on Ram 1500
asset.description:
This video demonstrates the installation of the ARIES S2885 6" Oval Side Bars on a 2014 Ram 1500 Quad Cab.  These side bars are available in a stainless steel finish.  For this installation, we used the 4500 bracket.  These brackets are vehicle specific.

Features Include:
304 stainless steel
OE style tubular construction
Extra-wide, anti-skid step pad

(4500 Bracket) Vehicle Coverage:
2009-2015 Ram 1500 Quad Cab
2009-2015 Ram 1500 Crew Cab
2010-2015 Ram 2500/3500 Crew Cab

Part #
4500 (Bracket)
S2885 (Stainless steel side bar)
asset.author: ARIES Automotive
